Articles.Content: Is there any way to edit the planet to have more airfields? I'd like to be able to build airports at the bases I've established on the surface.

Unless you are an expert developer, no. It took bac9 forever to just to remake the the old KSC, so moving an airway to another planet that doesn't have flat surfaces is nearly impossible. That is, if you have the skill then by all means do it.
